name: Resinous Frog
description: The Resinous Frog is a small creature with a unique adhesive skin, allowing it to stick to anything that touches it. It has a resilient constitution and a prominent tongue which it can detach.
memorable: Its ability to adhere to and drag along opponents in combat can create significant tactical challenges.
goals: To ambush prey and immobilize creatures for easier capture.
relations: May be encountered in swamps or dense vegetation with other small beasts.
environment: Found in wetlands, swamps, or areas with abundant moisture.
strengths: Strong constitution and the ability to immobilize creatures using its adhesive skin.
weaknesses: Lower dexterity and intelligence make it less agile and cunning.
attacks: Utilizes a sharp bite and a long, grappling tongue for combat.
most_powerful_ability: Adhesive Skin allows it to successfully grapple and maneuver opponents.
additional_information: Detaches tongue to avoid opportunity attacks.
Regenerates tongue after a short or long rest.
Gains advantage on attacks against grappled creatures.
test_queries: small frog that grapples with its tongue
frog with adhesive skin and detachable tongue
versatile amphibian that sticks to attackers
monster that immobilizes prey in swamps
